subject: [Mhln] WINDOWS XP PRO
body:
The careful application of terror is also a form of communication.

We are all of us, more or less, the slaves of opinion.

Speak of me as I am. Nothing extenuate, nor set down aught in malice.

Good luck is the willing handmaid of a upright and energetic character, and conscientious observance of duty.

The shortest distance between two points is under construction.

Desire is the essence of a man.

It is a common seen by experience that excellent memories do often accompany weak judgments.

You can lay down and die, or you can get up and fight, but that's it -- there's no turning back.

My rackets are run on strictly American lines and they're going to stay that way.

Life would be infinitely happier if we could only be born at the age of eighty and gradually approach eighteen.

All people are equal, it is not birth, it is virtue alone that makes the difference.

Who ever has no fixed opinions has no constant feelings.

Death is the golden key that opens the palace of eternity.
